title: ജാനുവമ്മ പറഞ്ഞ കഥ | Januvamma Paranja Katha
description: Collection of stories of Januvamma, written by Madhavikkutty. It has 22 stories with Illustrations by Artist Namboodiri. And at the end, Dr M N Karasery adds write up on 'original' Januvamma, who inspired Madhavikkutty.
author: Kamala Suraiyya Das
